org.carrot2.util.xslt

Class StylesheetErrorListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.carrot2.util.xslt.StylesheetErrorListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorListener

    public final class StylesheetErrorListener
extends Object
implements ErrorListener
    An ErrorListener that reacts to errors when parsing (compiling) the stylesheet.
